title: Fundamental Accessibility Tests: Visual Adjustments
description: These tests include changing the font and text size, colors, brightness, compatibility with magnification utilities and support for high contrast and SVG images.

tests.xhtml:
visual-010 Change font size

Use the controls available in the application or else in the operating system to change (increase/decrease) the size of the font. The font size change should apply uniformly on all the book content including the Table of Contents, Footnotes, Page List, Notes and Bookmarks.

Font size affect can be evaluated on the sample text.

Indicate Pass or Fail.
tests.name: Change font size
tests.description: Use the controls available in the application or else in the operating system to change (increase/decrease) the size of the font. The font size change should apply uniformly on all the book content including the Table of Contents, Footnotes, Page List, Notes and Bookmarks.

tests.xhtml:
visual-110 Change background and foreground color

Change background and foreground colour (May be through reading system feature or through OS settings).

The reading system should provide a choice of different foreground and background colour combinations. Alternatively, such colour themes if present in the Operating System should be respected by the reading system.

Indicate Pass or Fail.
tests.name: Change background and foreground color
tests.description: Change background and foreground colour (May be through reading system feature or through OS settings).

tests.xhtml:
visual-210 Change brightness

Use the controls available in the application or else in the operating system to change (increase/decrease) the screen brightness.

Indicate Pass or Fail.
tests.name: Change brightness
tests.description: Use the controls available in the application or else in the operating system to change (increase/decrease) the screen brightness.

tests.xhtml:
visual-310 Apply high contrast system configuration

The reading system interface and book content except images should respect the high contrast mode (invert colors) if present in the Operating System.

Indicate Pass or Fail.
tests.name: Apply high contrast system configuration
tests.description: The reading system interface and book content except images should respect the high contrast mode (invert colors) if present in the Operating System.

tests.xhtml:
visual-410 Magnify the User Interface(UI)

Use the controls available in the application or else in the operating system to magnify the Reading System screen. All aspects of the User Interface such as Menus, Pop-up Windows, Dialog Boxes and Search Box should get magnified uniformly.

Indicate Pass or Fail.
tests.name: Magnify the User Interface(UI)
tests.description: Use the controls available in the application or else in the operating system to magnify the Reading System screen. All aspects of the User Interface such as Menus, Pop-up Windows, Dialog Boxes and Search Box should get magnified uniformly.

tests.xhtml:
visual-510 Change Font

Choose from a selection of fonts, including sans-serif and serif options.

Indicate Pass or Fail.
tests.name: Change Font
tests.description: Choose from a selection of fonts, including sans-serif and serif options.

tests.xhtml:
visual-610 Support for SVG

Check if a image is displayed below this paragraph. This image is in SVG format.

Indicate Pass or Fail.
tests.name: Support for SVG
tests.description: Check if a image is displayed below this paragraph. This image is in SVG format.

tests.xhtml:
visual-710 Enlarge SVG image

Check if the image given in the previous test can be enlarged.

Indicate Pass or Fail.
tests.name: Enlarge SVG image
tests.description: Check if the image given in the previous test can be enlarged.
